source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim)
- **New Data:** where a workc in the source does not exist as an EmployeeID in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on workc in source and EmployeeID in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeID in the target exists but the same workc doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View hr_employee_leavers_dim_new is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_employee_leavers_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"
SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T3.EmployeeID IS NULL
        THEN T7.EmployeeLeaversID
        ELSE NULL
    END                     AS EmployeeLeaversID,     
    T1.Pers_No              AS EmployeeID,
    T1.Pers_No              AS EmployeeNumber,
    T1.Reason_For_Action    AS ReasonForLeaving, 
    CASE 
        WHEN T1.Org_Start_Date = '00/00/0000'
        THEN '1900-01-01 00:00:00'
        ELSE T1.Org_Start_Date
    END                     AS EmploymentStartDate,
    T1.Leaving              AS EmploymentEndDate,
    T1.Act                  AS Act,
    T1.Action_Type           AS ActionType,
    T1.ActR                 AS ActR,
    T1.S                    AS S,
    T1.User_ID              AS UserID,
    T1.WorkC                AS WorkC,
    T2.SourceSystemID       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.Reason_For_Action,'.'),
        IFNULL(CAST(T1.Leaving AS String),'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.Act,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.ActR,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.S,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.User_ID,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    T7.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.PersNumber AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim T7 ON   T3.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND 
                                                        CAST(T1.Leaving AS DATE) = CAST(T7.EmploymentEndDate AS DATE) AND 
                                                        T7.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T3.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND 
            CAST(T1.Leaving AS DATE) = CAST(T7.EmploymentEndDate AS DATE) AND
            md5(concat(
                IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Reason_For_Action,'.'),
                IFNULL(CAST(T1.Leaving AS String),'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Act,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.ActR,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.S,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.User_ID,'.'))) <> T7.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.EmployeeID IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y')

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **hr_employee_leavers_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows

    AS

SELECT 
    EmployeeLeaversID,
    EmployeeID,
    ReasonForLeaving, 
    EmploymentStartDate,
    EmploymentEndDate,
    Act,
    ActionType,
    ActR,
    S,
    UserID,
    WorkC,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From hr_employee_leavers_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    T1.EmployeeLeaversID,
    T1.EmployeeID,
    T1.ReasonForLeaving, 
    T1.EmploymentStartDate,
    T1.EmploymentEndDate,
    T1.Act,
    T1.ActionType,
    T1.ActR,
    T1.S,
    T1.UserID,
    T1.WorkC,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim T1
WHERE EmployeeID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM hr_employee_leavers_dim_new WHERE EmployeeLeaversID IS NULL) AND
    EmploymentEndDate IN (SELECT EmploymentEndDate FROM hr_employee_leavers_dim_new WHERE EmployeeID = T1.EmployeeID AND EmployeeLeaversID IS NULL) AND
    IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM hr_employee_leavers_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    T1.EmployeeLeaversID,
    T1.EmployeeID,
    T1.ReasonForLeaving, 
    T1.EmploymentStartDate,
    T1.EmploymentEndDate,
    T1.Act,
    T1.ActionType,
    T1.ActR,
    T1.S,
    T1.UserID,
    T1.WorkC,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. workc from SAPHR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.hr_employee_leavers_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim AS Target
USING hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.EmployeeLeaversID = Target.EmployeeLeaversID AND Source.EmploymentEndDate = Target.EmploymentEndDate AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (EmployeeLeaversID,
        EmployeeID,
        ReasonForLeaving, 
        EmploymentStartDate,
        EmploymentEndDate,
        Act,
        ActionType,
        ActR,
        S,
        UserID,
        WorkC,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.EmployeeLeaversID,
        Source.EmployeeID,
        Source.ReasonForLeaving, 
        Source.EmploymentStartDate,
        Source.EmploymentEndDate,
        Source.Act,
        Source.ActionType,
        Source.ActR,
        Source.S,
        Source.UserID,
        Source.WorkC,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.hr_employee_leavers_dim is updated

%%sql

-- Insert new ContractID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EmployeeLeaversID NULLS LAST) AS EmployeeLeaversID,
    EmployeeID,
    ReasonForLeaving, 
    EmploymentStartDate,
    EmploymentEndDate,
    Act,
    ActionType,
    ActR,
    S,
    UserID,
    WorkC,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim;
Setting the leavers EmployeeID that are active in , hr_employee_fact and hr_record_ract to IsActive = 'N'

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW hr_employee_leavers_leaving_this_month

AS

SELECT  DISTINCT

    *

FROM hr_employee_leavers_dim_changed_rows_final

WHERE SUBSTRING(EmploymentENDDate, 0, 7) = (SELECT SUBSTRING(MAX(EXPECTED_FROM), 0, 7) FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers)
AND EmployeeLeaversID IS NULL

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim AS Target
USING hr_employee_leavers_leaving_this_month AS Source

ON Source.EmployeeID = Target.EmployeeID AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact AS Target
USING hr_employee_leavers_leaving_this_month AS Source

ON Source.EmployeeID = Target.EmployeeID AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact AS Target
USING hr_employee_leavers_leaving_this_month AS Source

ON Source.EmployeeID = Target.EmployeeID AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'
